name: Dates Inferno
description:
When you wake up at the gates of Hell and you don't remember anything except that you have to find answers to your questions... And here they are, these answers, right here, outside the gates of Hell, it seems that you are in a situation "worse than ever".

But what if the inferno we know isn't what it really is? What if all the books on earth lie only to frighten simple mortals? What if demons are not fanged, tailed evil creatures, but seductive girls (only with small deviations from earthly standards)? What if the pots of boiling resin are not designed to torture the sinners, but for SPA treatments. And what if the coolest and most incendiary parties are held in the Hell?

Will you dare to come in? Will you have courage to go through all the circles of Hell and conquer the charming inhabitants of the Hell with your perseverance and charisma? Are you smart enough to deserve the answers you're looking for? After all, for this you need to perform personal tasks of cute demonesses and reach the Lucifer girl. You will have to use all available methods to get what you want: wit, seductiveness, resourcefulness, humor, charm... what else do you have in store? Soul? Hahah! Hold it for now. Here it is not the best-selling product (and damn the mortal who first came up with such nonsense).


Features of the game:
* Unusually colorful infernal locations
* Interesting tasks and incredible tests
* Seductive charismatic demonesses with whom there is something to chat
* Exciting otherworldly story with a slight romantic bias

Still can't make up your mind? Come on, it's easy: meet a new demoness - conquer her, if doesn't work immediately, bring her an offering (yes, hell women also love gifts), conquered? now do all her errands and voila! you can ask your questions. Don't be scared! Come on in and enjoy the process!
